title: 20: Confronting Billionaire CEO of Robinhood
itunes:title: Confronting Billionaire CEO of Robinhood
description:
Big guest alert! This week Ben and Emil ask the Robinhood CEO, Vlad Tenev, as many questions as they can before his body guards intersect. How large are Vlad's hands? Why did he sell his Robinhood stock at all time lows? Will he give Ben and Emil money?? All this, and more, on this week's Trillionaire Mindset!

Listen on Apple Podcasts: http://apple.co/trillionaire

Go to https://Stamps.com, click the microphone at the top of the page, and enter code TRILL.
